DISPLAY PROMPT
Usage: display < H | M | V | all | auto | off >
Modify your prompt to show your hit points, mana, and/or movement points.
> display hv Display hit points and movement points > display off Return to normal display > display all Display hit, mana, and move points > display auto Display hit, mana, and move when they are below 30%
See also: TOGGLE
